radiographic_examinations.findings: Reticulonodular opacities at the base of the right lung, sutures from a lobectomy of the right middle lobe, healed right rib fracture, and interposition of the transverse colon between the liver and the right hemidiaphragm.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: No changes compared with chest radiographs and CT scans obtained 9 months previously.
